RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOE TAPPIN LUKE never far back, closed willingly thee then two wide through deep stretch under strong handling and got up in the final strides. STRIKE APPEAL sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch shook clear before the furlong marker and just missed hanging on. ITASCA pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then faded. IT'S FATE saved ground and passed tiring rivals through the stretch in the three path. SHELL FIRE failed to menace. ADIOS BOBBY stalked the pace into the stretch, drifted to the five path and weakened. SCAT SHACK was no factor. CUMBER had speed for a half then gave way. TWO GUNS settled mid pack and weakened on the far turn. HADDASSAH'S DEVIL was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Scat Shack
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: It's Fate
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Strike Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, shook clear top lane, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Adios Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked drifted 5path, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Itasca
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Toe Tappin Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 3-2wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Cumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed half, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Shell Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Haddassah's Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Two Guns
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OAXACA away alertly, set a pressured pace three wide down the backstretch, drifted in from the four path to the two nearing the turn wide putting rivals in tight, had her heels clipped then finished full of run through the stretch to win going away. WORTHERWEIGHTNGOLD pressured the winner between horses two wide, was in tight entering the turn as that one drifted in, kept pressured into the stretch then was no match while well clear for second. MO RISSA pressed the pace along the rail down the backstretch, was also in tight entering the turn, clipped heels with the winner, bobbled and lost momentum. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT failed to respond. CAUSE OF LOVE trailed. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF WOTHERWEIGHTINGOLD LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR INTERFERENCE ENTERING THE TURN. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED OAXACA AND PLACED HER THIRD.

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Rissa
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed rail, in tight, clipped heels 7/16pole, lost momentum

ENTRY.NAME: Wortherweightngold
ENTRY.OWNER: Fairwinds Farm and Shafer, Steve D.
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, in tight 7/16pole, no match, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: No Twowaysaboutit
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Oaxaca
ENTRY.COMMENT: alert start, set pressured pace, drifted in 7/16pole, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Cause of Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANCIN' ROSIE set the lead along the inside into the turn, gave up the advantage before mid turn, fought back gamely under right handed urging to regain command near mid stretch and proved best in a game effort. APPEALING SENORITA had speed from the start, loomed boldly along the rail midway on the turn, battled with the winner until deep stretch and finished second best. TALE OF THE LYON pressed the early pace three wide, made the lead two wide nearing mid turn, battled into the stretch then was outfinished. LADY ABRIL pressed the pace two wide into the turn, had speed into the stretch then weakened. COWCHI settled inside and went evenly. NOT A WILD BRAT was antsy in the gate then no factor. I'M JAC'D had brief speed. J J'S FANCY was outrun. CITY SIGNS was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin' Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: early inside lead, headed turn, fought back, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, loomed boldly turn, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Cowchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Wild Brat
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Abril
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: City Signs
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Jac'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tale of the Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3 wide, led turn, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIMIT UP away alertly, set all the pace, widened into the stretch under right handed urging and won in hand. FLIPPING FISH was in tight, steadied near the half mild pole, chased the winner two wide then along the inside into the stretch, shifted to the four path and was no match while well clear for second. OVER THE HILLS offered a mild bid four wide into the turn then failed to sustain that bid. TIME HEIST chased the winner three then two wide through the turn then weakened. VENETIAN DREAM had brief speed inside. THE DRAKE trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: The Drake
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Flipping Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight, steadied 1/2 pole, vied 2w, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Limit Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, widened lane, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Time Heist
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3-2wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For$7,500 O r Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILDCAT EXPRESS sprinted to the lead shortly after the start, set all the pace unchallenged and widened through the stretch under right handed urging to win as much the best. RECKLESS L J never far back, offered a mild bid four wide through the turn and finished clear for second. MANNFORD allowed to settle, improved position outside. GOLD N SILVER passed tiring rivals. EL MARRO chased the winner two wide and faded in the stretch. HENRY THE CAT failed to menace. ROSCO P. COLTRANE chased the winner from the inside through the turn then gave way. PRIVATE DRIVE had brief speed. TIGER TRAIL hit the gate, bore in at the start and was always outrun. TEQUILA FLATS showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate, bore in start,

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, full of run, right urging, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Rosco P. Coltrane
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Flats
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: El Marro
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gold N Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Private Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Henry the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Mannford
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, improved position outside

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless L J
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, middle move, 4 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: First Lady S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 90. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES, THREE YEARS OLD (OHIO REGISTERED). $50 to nominate. $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weight: 124 lbs. Non-win ners of a sweepstakes, allowed 2 lbs.; Non-winners of three races, 4 lbs.; Non-winners of two races, 6 lbs. Starters to be named through the entry box Tuesday, November 14, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BACK TO OHIO bobbled at the start, prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead under right handed urging near the furlong marker and proved best under confident handling. LADY LOTTIE sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace two wide into the stretch then couldn't handle the winner late while gamely second best. BUCKEYE PRINCESS brushed the gate, was never far back, improved position two wide through the turn, dropped to the rail in upper stretch and finished with good courage. NEECHI vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch then faded late. SPARKLING JEWEL with the second flight three wide, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate, close up, 2 wide, angled in top lane, good try

ENTRY.NAME: Neechi
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Lottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, 2 wide, dug in, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Back to Ohio
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, pressed pace, 2w, late lead, confident handling

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkling Jewel
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cardinal S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 101. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD (OHIO REGISTERED). $50 to nominate. $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weights: Three-Year-Old s 122 lbs.; Older 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Sweepstakes in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; Three races other than maiden, claiming or starter in 2023, 4 lbs.; Two races other than maiden, claiming or starter in 2023, 6 lbs. Starters to be named through the entry box Tuesday, November 14, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIONISTIC away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under mild right handed urging to win going away while under confident handling. EXCITEMENT pressured the winner two wide and gamely gained second. MR LOOOCH vied for the lead three wide and was outfinished in a determined effort. DARK VADER close up three wide, swung out to the six path entering the stretch giving up ground then came on again late. COUNTRY CLUB BOBBY was a froward factor two wide and lacked the needed response. QUIET AMIGO with the second flight inside, was through after a half. ALTISSIMO trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Amigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Country Club Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2w, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Vader
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up 3 wide, swung wide, came again 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Lionistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led throughout, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Excitement
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gamely gained second

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Loooch
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Altissimo
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Hollywood Gaming Mahoning Distaff S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 96. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Free nomination. $500 to enter with $100,000 Guaranteed. Supplemental nomination of $2,000 will be accepted at time of entry which shall include all fees. The purse to be distributed: $1,000 to all starte rs seventh through last. The remaining balance to be distributed: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weights: Three-Year-Olds 123 lbs.; Older 125 lbs. Non-winners of an unrestricted sweepstakes of $60,0 00 or more in 2023 allowed 3 lbs.; Non-winners of three races other than Maiden, Claiming or Starter in 2023, 5 lbs.; Two such races, 7 lbs. First Preference to Graded Stakes winners in 2022-23; Second Preference to Graded Stakes placed horses and Stakesw inners in 2022-23; Third Preference to highest total earnings in 2022-23. Starters to be named through the entry box Tuesday, November 14, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophy presented to the Winning Owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOODY WOMAN always within striking distance, rallied two then three wide into the stretch engaging the leaders before the furlong marker, dug in under right handed urging while being carried out to the eight path through the final stages and proved best under strong handling. MY DESTINY away alertly, set a pressured pace three wide then inside rivals into the stretch, drifted out under left handed urging through deep stretch to the seven path then couldn't handle the winner. ROSEBUG had good early speed along the inside, dropped back on the turn, altered course outside the top trio before the furlong marker and finished with good courage in the middle of the racetrack. LIBERTY BELLE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, was in tight while beginning to fade between rivals past the furlong marker and weakened. DECO STRONG had brief speed. THINK IT THRU had speed along the inside into the turn then wilted. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF LIBERTY BELLLE LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF MY DESTINY FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Think It Thru
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed turn, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Rosebug
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dropped back, swung wide, finished well, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: My Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 3w, inside, drifted out left urging, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, in tight past 1/8pole, faded, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Moody Woman
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3w,carried 8path,long drive, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Deco Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cheryl S. White Memorial S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 101. Stakes Purse 200000. FOR FILLIES, THREE YEARS OLD. Free nomination. $1,000 to enter with $200,000 Guaranteed. Supplemental nomination of $4,000 will be accepted at time of entry which shall include all fees. The purse to be distributed: $2,000 to all starters seventh through last. The remaining balance to be distributed: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third: 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weight: 124 lbs. Non-winners of an unrestricted Sweepstakes of $60,000 or more in 2023 allowed 3 lbs.; $60,000 twice in 2023, 5 lbs.; $45,000 once in 2023, 7 lbs. (Maiden and Claiming races not considered in estimating allowances). First Preference to Graded Stakes winners in 2022-23; Second Preference to Graded Stakes placed horses and Stakes winners in 2022-23; Third Pr eference to highest total earnings in 2022-23. Starters to be named through the entry box Tuesday, November 14, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophies presented to the Winning Owner, Trainer and Jockey.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JERSEY PEARL stalked the pace down the backstretch, moved closer three wide nearing the quarter pole, dug in determinedly under left handed urging in the seven path through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. WHITE CHOCOLATE was hustled to the lead gaining a narrow advantage soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted out repeatedly to the five path under left handed urging then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. CONDENSATION unhurried early, had a mild late rally three wide. SIMPLY STATED had good early speed three then two wide and lacked the needed response. LATE FROST pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch and gave way late. ZAPPLE had brief speed six wide. POETICA brushed the gate at the start, was guided outside soon thereafter, inched closer on the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Late Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: White Chocolate
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace 2 wide, drifted out, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Stated
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up 3 wide, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Pearl
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, loomed 3 wide turn, dug in 7path, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Poetica
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate start, taken outside, inched closer turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Condensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally late 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Zapple
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Steel Valley Sprint S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 10 6F Dirt CR: 105. Stakes Purse 300000. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS. Free nomination. $1,500 to enter with $300,000 Guaranteed. Supplemental nominations of $6,000 will be accepted at time of entry which shall include all fees. The purse to be distributed: $3,000 to all starters seventh through last. Th e remaining balance to be distributed: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weight: 124 lbs. Non-winners of a unrestricted Sweepstakes of $60,000 or more in 2023 allowed 3 lbs.; $60,000 twice in 2023, 5 l bs.; $45,000 once in 2023, 7 lbs. (Maiden and Claiming races not considered in estimating allowances). First Preference to Graded Stakes winners in 2022-23; Second Preference to Graded Stakes placed horses and Stakes winners in 2022-23; Third Preference t o highest total earnings in 2022-23. Starters to be named through the entry box Tuesday, November 14, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophies presented to the Winning Owner, Trainer and Jockey.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RYVIT was bumped between rivals at the start, settled along the inside through the turn, swung outside rivals entering the stretch, rallied under right handed urging in the nine path to make the lead late and drew clear. DAMON'S MOUND also bumped between rivals at the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted to the eighth path under left handed urging while maintaining the advantage until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. SUPER CHOW pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, was carried out to the eight path and faded late. HALMSTAD was in tight at the start, stalked the pace outside for a half, angled into the four path at the top of the stretch and improved position late. RECRUITER unhurried early, had a mild late rally in the four path. UNCASHED drifted in at the start, prompted the pace three wide into the stretch, was forced wide then weakened. NAUTICAL STAR settled mid pack, swung wide and went evenly in the middle of the racetrack. AGNELLO'S DREAM bore in at the start bumping rivals and was no threat. FROSTED DEPARTURE bore out at the start bumping rivals and had brief speed. MEADOW VALUE was bumped between rivals at teh start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Frosted Departure
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Damon's Mound
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pressured pace inside, drifted 8path, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Meadow Value
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Ryvit
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, inside early, swung wide, closed mid track, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in start, bumped, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Recruiter
ENTRY.OWNER: Lynch Racing LLC and Nick Sanna Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Nautical Star
ENTRY.OWNER: C2 Racing Stable LLC and Stefania Farms LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, swung wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Super Chow
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, carried out 8path top lane, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Halmstad
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, stalked outside, angled in top lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Uncashed
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in start, pressed 3w, forced out upper stretch, weakened
